tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"海神戟","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['[{"text":"长按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.use","color":"white"},{"text":"] ","color":"white"},"以将它掷出。"]','""','{"text":"技能：激流跃迁","italic": false,"color":"aqua"}','{"text":"当站在水中投掷，你会跟随它一并飞出，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"并对飞行途中触碰的生物造成 9 点伤害。","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"此后，你在空中可以保持最长 5 秒","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"缓降","underlined": true},"。"]','[{"text":"（减缓下坠并免除摔落伤害）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','""','{"text":"技能：电能之触","italic": false,"color":"aqua"}','{"text":"当在陆地上投掷，它会在落点引来闪电，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"然后飞回你的手中。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"该闪电会击中其 6×6 范围内的所有生物，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"并造成 2 次伤害，每次 5 点。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"10 点","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ❇ 攻速  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"每秒 1 次","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
